attributes.action: Ban the handling of cooked foods for aesthetic and other purposes with bare hands in restaurants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MRSA is rife in hospital wards, possibly now surpassed by C. difficile. There have been many deaths in recent years from food poisoning by Salmonella or by E coli 157. Now we live in dread of bird flu tranferring to humans and causing a pandemic. Transfer of the infective organisms on unwashed hands is a major vector.

There have been campaigns to improve hygeine by additional hand washes in hospital wards and care homes, supplemented by the provision of alcohol gel for hand rubs.

In this scenario, it is time to ban the handling (with bare hands) of cooked food by kitchen staff, done mainly for reasons of presentation, in professional restaurants and as seen in many 'chef' programmes on TV.
